high_descs: Walk forward until the dresser is on your left then turn left and walk to the clock on the dresser.
Pick up the clock that's in front of you.
Walk around the dresser to your left then stand looking down the length of the dresser with the wall on your left and the light in front of you.
anns.task_desc: Inspect a clock by lamp light.

high_descs: take the clock to the lamp
anns.task_desc: look at the clock under the lamp

high_descs: Move forward past the bed, turn left, go to the dresser.
Pick up the clock on the dresser.
Bring the clock to the lamp on the left side of the dresser.
anns.task_desc: Examine a clock in the light of the lamp on the dresser.
